channel.title: KTVZ - NewsChannel 21 | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/KTVZ21/

item.title: Wall Street just gave Warren Buffett an early birthday gift:
item.description: Wall Street just gave Warren Buffett an early birthday gift: Berkshire Hathaway is now worth $1 trillion.

item.title: A former Nevada politician who was accused of fatally stabbi
item.description: A former Nevada politician who was accused of fatally stabbing a Las Vegas investigative reporter after a series of critical stories was found guilty of murder today in a trial that highlighted concerns around press safety.

item.title: The FBI has released new photos of the gun used to shoot Don
item.description: The FBI has released new photos of the gun used to shoot Donald Trump during a July rally in Butler, Pennsylvania, as well as the backpack and explosives the shooter had in his car at the rally.
